Quote.Author: Mencius
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is one mind in two bodies

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: All an actor has is their blind faith that they are who they say they are today, in any scene

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very good life - I'm lucky enough not to be deprived

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to go where people are serious about acting

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: Instant gratification is not soon enough

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: Having been let out of the barn once, I know I wouldn't be happy if I were home all the time

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: Expensive clothes are a waste of money

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: There are improbable things suspended in space, like the earth

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy

Quote.Author: Meryl Streep
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never so sure as I was in my mid-20s

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope all you young girls see yourself up there... we were just like you

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: There are always new, grander challenges to confront, and a true winner will embrace each one

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: You may get skinned knees and elbows, but it's worth it if you score a spectacular goal

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't love what you do, you won't do it with much conviction or passion

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: Success breeds success

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not sacrifice if you love what you're doing

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: True champions aren't always the ones that win, but those with the most guts

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your heart and make it your decision

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: I love watching gymnastics, swimming, and track and field

Quote.Author: Mia Hamm
Quote.QuoteValue: Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don't settle for them

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I am what I am and, you know, I'm a very lucky guy

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The cold harsh reality is that we have to balance the budget

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I know how to make decisions and stand up to the criticism every day

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We will rebuild, renew and remain the capital of the free world

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We will go forward... we will never go back

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Stubborn isn't a word I would use to describe myself; pigheaded is more appropriate

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't depend on polls

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You are safer here tonight than you would be on the streets of any other city in the world

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: No place epitomizes the American experience and the American spirit more than New York City

Quote.Author: Michael Bloomberg
Quote.QuoteValue: What has changed is that people have stopped working together

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: Be like a duck. Calm on the surface, but always paddling like the dickens underneath

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: When you reach the top, that's when the climb begins

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: Alfie was the first time I was above the title; the first time I became a star in America

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: At 69, I got the girl! And it wasn't a 68-year-old girl, either

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is underrepresented in every actor's life, because it's so bloody difficult to write

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: I felt a tremendous sadness for men who can't deal with a woman of their own age

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: Save your money. You're going to need twice as much money in your old age as you think

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm every bourgeois nightmare - a Cockney with intelligence and a million dollars

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, growing old is great. It's the very best thing - considering the alternative

Quote.Author: Michael Caine
Quote.QuoteValue: Obsession is a young man's game, and my only excuse is that I never grew old

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: It's often the case that successful people invite criticism

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a brother-in-law who lives in Spain

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm clear that we do need to improve what's happening in our schools

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: I think more and more respect has been accorded to teachers, and quite rightly so

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: In this fallen world, I suspect we will never achieve perfection. But that won't stop me trying

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a decentralizer. I believe in trusting professionals

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: I want people to be the authors of their own life story

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: The accumulation of cultural capital - the acquisition of knowledge - is the key to social mobility

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever since going up to university, I have accumulated new debt, and new means of becoming indebted

Quote.Author: Michael Gove
Quote.QuoteValue: Many more schools can be outstanding

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: As a physician specializing in nutrition, my priority is to the health of the public

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: Ounce for ounce, herbs and spices have more antioxidants than any other food group

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: Good news for orange lovers: citrus fruit intake has been associated with reduced stroke risk

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: A plant-based diet is like a one-stop shop against chronic diseases

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: Sick animals can lead to sick people

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone feels sad occasionally. A full range of emotions is part of what makes us human

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it feels like there aren't enough hours in a day to get everything done

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: As you age, your blood pressure tends to get higher

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: Breast cancer is thought to use cholesterol to help the cancer migrate and invade more tissue

Quote.Author: Michael Greger
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking at a moderate pace for an hour a day is considered a moderately intense level of exercise

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: What I like are films that take me seriously, that don't treat me as more stupid than I am

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: As a private person, professionally I am invisible

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: An artist is someone who should raise questions rather than give answers. I have no message

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually music is used to hide a film's problems

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: A feature film is twenty-four lies per second

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: It's harder to write a story with just two people in a room than with 50 characters

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider all my films experiments

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: What we're doing for another person is more important than what we're feeling for them

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: All movies assault the viewer in one way or another

Quote.Author: Michael Haneke
Quote.QuoteValue: As a European filmmaker, you can not make a genre film seriously. You can only make a parody

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: It was either write or die for me

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: I went into journalism to do journalism, not advertising

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: My younger brother is a decorated combat veteran and was a platoon leader in Iraq

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be the greatest investigative reporter of my generation

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: During the invasion of Iraq in 2003, the military conducted only a handful of drone missions

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: The genius of David Petraeus has always been his masterful manipulation of the media

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: When writing for a mass audience, put a fact in every sentence

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: By the second sentence of a pitch, the entirety of the story should be explained

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought Gen. McChrystal was unfireable, that his position was secure

Quote.Author: Michael Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: General McChrystal wanted to be on the cover of 'Rolling Stone.'

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Family is not an important thing. It's everything

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the scariest person in the world is the person with no sense of humor

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: The least amount of judging we can do, the better off we are

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: My view of life is colored by humor and looking at the best in any situation

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Life delivered me a catastrophe, but I found a richness of soul

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a dad, I'm a husband, I'm an activist, I'm a writer and I'm just a student of the world

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact, Parkinson's has made me a better person. A better husband, father and overall human being

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: The more I expect, the more unhappy I am going to be. The more I accept, the more serene I am

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was younger, I was always described as happy-go-lucky

Quote.Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing worse than an opportunity you don't deserve is blowing an opportunity

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother's wonderful. To me she's perfection

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: But I will never stop helping and loving people the way Jesus said to

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy to be alive, I'm happy to be who I am

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just like anyone. I cut and I bleed. And I embarass easily

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just wish I could understand my father

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never pleased with anything, I'm a perfectionist, it's part of who I am

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because it's in print doesn't mean it's the gospel

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: When I see children, I see the face of God. That's why I love them so much. That's what I see

Quote.Author: Michael Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Please keep an open mind and let me have my day in court

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: Anesthesia is quite remarkable. It's lost time. And you wake up kind of refreshed

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: To this day, I have the most fond memories of some of my old toys

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: I get kinda self-conscious. I don't want to know about my eyebrows. I'm born with them

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an altar boy, which I loved and am very proud of. It was strict, but also really nice

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: Weirdly, for someone who wanted to be funny, I didn't like a lot of attention

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: There is the theory... that you live in two places: You either live in fear, or you live in love

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew the way in was Bruce Wayne. It wasn't Batman. It was never Batman. That was the key

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believed that Batman had the potential to be one of the coolest guys in cinema

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: There are very few jobs where you're held up to public scrutiny

Quote.Author: Michael Keaton
Quote.QuoteValue: Filmmaking is the ultimate team sport

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: Art teaches nothing, except the significance of life

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed it is necessary to accept the world as it is and rise above it

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: The purely agitation attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you can dream, the more you can do

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: Numbers of sales do not correspond to numbers of readers

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: Act well at the moment, and you have performed a good action for all eternity

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: What you hear repeatedly you will eventually believe

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: Men naturally resent it when women take greater liberties in dress than men are allowed

Quote.Author: Michael Korda
Quote.QuoteValue: An ounce of hypocrisy is worth a pound of ambition

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: A man in a well tailored suit will always shine brighter than a guy in an off-the-rack suit

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I was trendier. I'd wear anything. I was in love beads and platforms

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the older I get, the more I realize that the ultimate luxury is time

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn to invest in the best quality you can afford and wear pieces in different ways

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, true luxury can be caviar or a day with no meetings, no appointments and no schedule

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what women look good in. I don't think the rules ever change

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans are always a little bit insecure

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: Clothes are like a good meal, a good movie, great pieces of music

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the oldest young designer in New York City

Quote.Author: Michael Kors
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me Caviar Kaspia and give me a hamburger. I love the two extremes

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: Love one another and you will be happy. It's as simple and as difficult as that

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a few ducks as a kid

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: Humanity hungers for the uncommon

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: A world view is probably an expression of self

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned to respect the whimsical

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: Have I got the right to experiment with my child's life?

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: Stay away from excellence at all costs; it stinks

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm totally deaf in my right ear, yeah

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness, it's a small thing - just a very little thing

Quote.Author: Michael Leunig
Quote.QuoteValue: I had many good teachers, but only three of them were school teachers

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Diets are a scam

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: WikiLeaks, God bless them, will save lives as a result of their actions

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't regulate child labor. You can't regulate slavery. Some things are just wrong

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Documentaries are a form of journalism

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a gullible side to the American people. They can be easily misled

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Clinton was a pretty good president for a Republican

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd feel bad if I had you come into a theater and you leave feeling ripped off

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm used to my films having little effect on making the world a better place

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't debate satire. Either you get it or you don't

Quote.Author: Michael Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: No decisions should ever be made without asking the question, is this for the common good?

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel most at home in the water. I disappear. That's where I belong

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I am 26 and, and I don't recover as fast as I have in the past

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't predict anything historic. But nothing is impossible

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you dream the more you achieve

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought, it would be neat to make the Olympic team

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the same kind of guy before all this happened

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in God; I'm not saying I'm highly religious

Quote.Author: Michael Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to go to the World Cup. I want to go to the Masters. I want to go... anywhere

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think perfect objectivity is an unrealistic goal; fairness, however, is not

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: Corn is a greedy crop, as farmers will tell you

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: A lawn is nature under totalitarian rule

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: High-quality food is better for your health

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: At home I serve the kind of food I know the story behind

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: The correlation between poverty and obesity can be traced to agricultural policies and subsidies

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps more than any other, the food industry is very sensitive to consumer demand

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: Plus, I love comic writing. Nothing satisfies me more than finding a funny way to phrase something

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: Without the potato, the balance of European power might never have tilted north

Quote.Author: Michael Pollan
Quote.QuoteValue: The garden suggests there might be a place where we can meet nature halfway

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: Strategy is about making choices, trade-offs; it's about deliberately choosing to be different

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of strategy is choosing what not to do

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: The best CEOs I know are teachers, and at the core of what they teach is strategy

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: Sound strategy starts with having the right goal

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: Innovation is the central issue in economic prosperity

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: The ability to change constantly and effectively is made easier by high-level continuity

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: The company without a strategy is willing to try anything

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: Change brings opportunities. On the other hand, change can be confusing

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of strategy is that you must set limits on what you're trying to accomplish

Quote.Author: Michael Porter
Quote.QuoteValue: The underlying principles of strategy are enduring, regardless of technology or the pace of change

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: When you start out in a team, you have to get the teamwork going and then you get something back

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: The more precisely I can drive, the more I enjoy myself

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: Once something is a passion, the motivation is there

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: Somehow I have managed to delay looking old. In reality I have good genes

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been in Formula One for 12 years, and out of that I had one year with the perfect car

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look right from the beginning of the season I've been very competitive

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's put it this way, I like number seven

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought records were there to be broken

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I was five when I had my real first go-kart

Quote.Author: Michael Schumacher
Quote.QuoteValue: I have really enjoyed my time at Ferrari, not just because of the successes

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing fixes a thing so intensely in the memory as the wish to forget it

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Stubborn and ardent clinging to one's opinion is the best proof of stupidity

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Lend yourself to others, but give yourself to yourself

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: My life has been full of terrible misfortunes most of which never happened

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: I know well what I am fleeing from but not what I am in search of

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Rejoice in the things that are present; all else is beyond thee

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Ignorance is the softest pillow on which a man can rest his head

Quote.Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is so firmly believed as what we least know

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius is eternal patience

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: My soul can find no staircase to Heaven unless it be through Earth's loveliness

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: The marble not yet carved can hold the form of every thought the greatest artist has

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: If people knew how hard I worked to get my mastery, it wouldn't seem so wonderful at all

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: A man paints with his brains and not with his hands

Quote.Author: Michelangelo
Quote.QuoteValue: I live and love in God's peculiar light

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: It's tough to find a place not to like in Switzerland

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: We're running out of rich people in this country

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Morals are built on religious faith. Virtue is built on morality and influences a culture

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: The government has no business telling an individual what kind of light bulb to buy

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Deprivation sometimes can be one of the most marvelous teachers

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a fighter. I'm not just there to go along and get along

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Carbon dioxide is natural. It is not harmful. It is part of Earth's life cycle

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I come here as one of you - an Iowan!

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: My husband and I had five biological children but we also have been raising 23 foster children

Quote.Author: Michele Bachmann
Quote.QuoteValue: The American people's vote can't be bought

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: When we're born, we want to know why the stars shine. We want to know why the sun rises

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: I have nothing against investment banking, but it's like massaging money rather than creating money

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe we exist in a multiverse of universes

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a child, it was cool to be a scientist

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: We do spend too much time on the telephone, and you know something? We love it

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: To a physicist, we have the 'I' word, the I-word is 'impossible.' That's dangerous

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: Chemistry is the melodies you can play on vibrating strings

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no reason why we cannot become smarter, more perfect, and maybe even live longer

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pointless to have a nice clean desk, because it means you're not doing anything

Quote.Author: Michio Kaku
Quote.QuoteValue: In science, nothing is ever 100% proven

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess you could say I'm what this country is all about

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: He who has the fastest golf cart never has a bad lie

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: Hitting the ball was easy. Running around the bases was the tough part

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I can do is play baseball. I have to play ball. It's the only thing I know

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: It's unbelievable how much you don't know about the game you've been playing all your life

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, baseball was my whole life. Nothing's ever been as fun as baseball

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: If I knew I was going to live this long, I'd have taken better care of myself

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care who you are, you hear those boos

Quote.Author: Mickey Mantle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll play baseball for the Army or fight for it, whatever they want me to do

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: It's innocence when it charms us, ignorance when it doesn't

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: When suffering comes, we yearn for some sign from God, forgetting we have just had one

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is the feeling we have that the feeling we have is not permanent

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance

Quote.Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote.QuoteValue: No one really listens to anyone else, and if you try it for a while you'll see why
